titleStmt.title: The land-tempest: or, A paper-pellet; or, much in a mouthfull; or, a long answer to a short question; containing an abstract, epitome, or effects of the woes of these wars. / By (W. P.) a plunder'd preacher in the county of Gloucester. Experta loquor.
titleStmt.author: W. P., plunder'd preacher in the county of Gloucester.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Nicholas Vavosour, and are to be sold at his shop in the Inner Temple,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing; bookseller's name and address and publication date from colophon.
At end of text: This is printed according to order.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in the Inner Temple
